title: Fat head sausage rolls
description: Crispy, chewy, cheese wrapped sausagey goodness
author: Sian Preece
instructions: You need to make sure your sausages are fully defrosted as the skin needs to be removed. To do this, slice the sausage down the middle and then peel back the skin slowly.
Cook the sausages until nicely brown
To make the almond flour, you will need to blend a bag of almonds. In a bowl, mix the flour, grated cheese and cream cheese. Microwave for 1 minute.
Stir then add the egg, salt and onion salt.
Between 2 pieces of baking parchment/paper, roll the mixture thinly.
Remove the top baking parchment/paper and slowly wrap the mixture around each sausage.
Place each sausage roll onto a greased oven tray, sprinkle onion salt and sesame seeds on top.
